# About Us
:::
::: {.card-content}
The Rome R Users Group is a local community for anyone interested in the R programming language — from beginners to experienced data scientists. Based in Rome, we bring together data professionals, researchers, students, and open-source enthusiasts to explore R’s powerful tools for data analysis, visualization, machine learning, and beyond.

[Learn more](about.qmd){.card-link}
